name: Jello Layer Salad
instructions: Add blackberry jello to 1 1/2 cups boiling water.
Mix and dissolve well, put in dish and let set.
Mix cherry jello with 1 cups boiling water.
Let cool and add 1/2 cups evaporated milk.
Mix lime jello and 1 1/2 cups boiling water.
Mix lemon jello and 1 cups boiling water.
Let cool and add 1/2 cups evaporated milk.
Mix orange jello and add 1 1/2 cups boiling water.
Mix orange pineapple jello with 1 cups boiling water.
Let cool and add 1/2 cups evaporated milk.
Mix strawberry jello and 1 1/2 cups boiling water.
Make sure each layer is mixed and dissolved well and set before adding the next layer.
